Articles.Content: where on my HP (windows) computer can i find my game files for KSP, i cant find the required folders to insert craft files

Greetings and welcome to the forums, @phycotic_sock.  If you have the steam version it will be in the steam/steam apps folder, if not you could use windows search function to find it.  Just search your computer for KSP.exe.

10 hours ago, phycotic_sock said:

where on my HP (windows) computer can i find my game files for KSP, i cant find the required folders to insert craft files

If you bought it through Steam and are still playing it where Steam installled it: in your Steam library, rightclick on Kerbal Space Program, Properties, Local Files, Browse Local Files...

If you bought it from the Squad store, rightclick the KSP icon on your desktop/menu/tile and 'Open file location'.
